answers.answer: Call your doctor. That's a sign of preeclampsia. My Dr said to call right away if you have a headache that won't go away.
Pre wat? Wait wat dose that mean. What is it

Preeclampsia. High blood pressure that can cause major problems. Look it up. Its dangerous. One time I had a headache for 2 days and I told my midwife at my next appointment. She freaked out and said never to do that again. She said if you ever have a headache that won't go away you need to call right away so they can make sure everything is OK.
I Get terrible migraines. My dr. Told me I could take a tylenol with a benedryl and a soda with caffeine. Then I rest and it helps a ton. I would give it a try.

I havnt tryed taken any pills causs i dont want to risk my little luna, i have tried resting the pain did calm down but didnt go away, it may be lack of caffine now that you saic that cause i try to drink a soda or two a day to me awake at work n the last two days i havent..

Try getting some fluids in you. Earlier on in my pregnancy I had what they call ice pick migraines. They were terrible. Tylenol is absolutely safe to take while pregnant. Just try maybe a cup of tea and just relax.

question: For the past two days i have got a really really bad head ach.. and today its only worrist.. to the point where im about to become sick... i have tried to lay down n sleep but that dosent help.. taken   a damp cloth just makes it hurt more
title: killer head achs what do i need to do
